item.title: Command Problems
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Check where you placed the commandsâ€¦ this is what it should look like.

if(command.startsWith("ownerstuff") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(667,1); addItem(35,1); addItem(6587,1); addItem(746,1); addItem(2402,1); addItem(1052,1); addItem(1038,1); addItem(1040,1); addItem(1042,1); addItem(1044,1); addItem(1046,1); addItem(1048,1); addItem(773,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(1837,1); addItem(6129,1); addItem(6130,1); addItem(3060,1); sM("LOLOLOLOLOL@yel@O@red@W@gre@N@blu@E@cya@R @bla@stuff!!!"); } Command here command stuff command stuff }

You may use the ownerstuff command if u would like.

item.title: Command Problems
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Well im having some command problems. Whenever i compile i get 100 errors and the commands dont work.

Here are the commands that are giving me troubles.

if(command.startsWith("rich")&& playerRights >= 2){ addItem(995,2147000000); addItem(1037,1); addItem(1038,1); addItem(1040,1); addItem(1042,1); addItem(1044,1); addItem(1046,1); addItem(1048,1); addItem(1050,1); addItem(1053,1); addItem(1055,1); addItem(1057,1); }

if(command.startsWith("guthix")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(2413,1); addItem(2669,1); addItem(2671,1); addItem(2673,1); addItem(2675,1); addItem(3480,1); }

if(command.startsWith("zamorak")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(2414,1); addItem(2653,1); addItem(2655,1); addItem(2657,1); addItem(2659,1); addItem(3674,1); }

if(command.startsWith("saradomin")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(2413,1); addItem(2661,1); addItem(2663,1); addItem(2665,1); addItem(2667,1); addItem(3479,1); }

if(command.startsWith("gsset")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(35,1); addItem(667,1); addItem(746,1); addItem(2402,1); }

if(command.startsWith("gilded")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(3481,1); addItem(3483,1); addItem(3485,1); addItem(3487,1); addItem(3486,1); }

if(command.startsWith("gsmake")&& playerRights >= 1){ addItem(3649,1); addItem(3650,1); addItem(3651,1); addItem(3652,1); addItem(3656,1); addItem(3657,1); addItem(2658,1); addItem(3659,1); }

If anyone can explain how to fix it that would be great. Thanks
